roles.title: Contract Software Engineer
roles.description: Rapidly implemented greenfield BI projects while experimenting with LLM-assisted software development workflows and pipelines - minimizing hallucinations and error propagation via context engineering, loosely coupled architectures, (Hindley-Milner) type-driven development, ADT pattern matching control flow, static code analysis/linting, etc.

roles.title: Data Annotator
roles.description: Provided high-quality training data to improve LLM performance in various coding tasks.

roles.title: Backpacker
roles.description: After the acquisition of Qwick and subsequent layoff of the engineering team, I took the opportunity to travel with a focus on visiting my favorite historical sites and monasteries, as well as basic language proficiency in Japanese and Turkish.

location: UK, Greece, Turkey, Iceland, Japan, South Korea, Belgium

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description:
• Full stack development with Reason-React front end consuming a GraphQL API, backed by a ReasonML (Melange) + PostgreSQL event/job system.
• Empowered Marketplace Ops, building tools to activate churned users.
• Entrusted with on-call prod support shifts, code review, hotfixes.

roles.title: Junior Software Engineer
roles.description:
• Delivered a W2 product offering on a team of 3 devs in 2 months, enabling new enterprise clients to use our platform compliantly.
• Rewrote legacy p2p referral payout system, reducing fraud & tech debt.

roles.title: Mobile App Developer (Senior Capstone)
roles.description:
• Co-designed & implemented a scrum-inspired task-management app.
• Conducted user research, tests, and experiments.
• Led a student team of 4 devs and 1 designer in Scrum rituals and code review.

roles.title: Software Engineer In Test
roles.description: Programmed automated end-to-end tests on an Agile QE team.

location: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
